body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jason Roberts and the customer's name is Michelle Thompson.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am a representative from QuickServe Solutions.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, nice to meet you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alex. To assist you better, could you please provide your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for that. And could you also tell me your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for that information, Alex.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Alex. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
